title: Student Satisfaction Analysis for Improving MOOCs-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: For prospective and in-service teachers, analyzes science MOOCs design elements in mobile environments to explore satisfaction improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can design a mixed-methods research approach (quantitative/qualitative) to measure student satisfaction in MOOC learning environments.
Learners can propose optimization strategies for content quality, interaction elements, and assessment systems when designing science MOOC courses.
Evaluate three instructional strategies to enhance learner engagement in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
